alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 4:52PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern La Paz County through 530 PM MST... At 452 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Quartzsite, or 18 miles south of Parker, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bouse. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 72 between mile markers 14 and 28. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 115 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
